name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a proficient Software Engineer with 8 years of expertise, I am adept in **React**, **JavaScript**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and backend development. I excel at frontend application performance profiling, optimization, and employ modern testing libraries for unit testing, component testing, and end-to-end testing. My background includes extensive collaboration across cross-functional teams, providing mentorship, and leveraging strong problem-solving abilities to drive project success. 
I am also experienced in utilizing **Python**, **Flutter**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** for high-performance solutions, with a robust understanding of **microservices architecture** and **event-driven systems**. My technical proficiency spans cloud services such as **Azure** and **AWS**, allowing me to lead the development of enterprise-grade platforms. Additionally, I have hands-on experience in developing **AI/ML capabilities**, implementing **MLOps workflows** with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, aligning applications with compliance standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My commitment to open-source contributions further enhances my problem-solving skills and continuous learning.
